identity.name: Alphabet Inc.
identity.description: Alphabet Inc. is the parent company of Google and several other businesses. It specializes in internet services and products, including online advertising technologies, search engines, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

competitors.name: Microsoft Corporation
competitors.description: Microsoft is a global technology company that develops, licenses, and supports a wide range of software products, services, and devices. It is known for its Windows operating system and Office productivity suite.
competitors.advantages: Strong enterprise software presence, extensive cloud services, and a diverse product portfolio.

competitors.name: Amazon.com, Inc.
competitors.description: Amazon is a multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. It is one of the largest online retailers in the world.
competitors.advantages: Dominance in e-commerce, extensive logistics network, and leading position in cloud services through AWS.

competitors.name: Meta Platforms, Inc.
competitors.description: Meta Platforms, formerly known as Facebook, is a technology conglomerate that focuses on social media, virtual reality, and augmented reality. It owns platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp.
competitors.advantages: Large user base, strong advertising revenue model, and significant investments in virtual and augmented reality.

competitors.name: Apple Inc.
competitors.description: Apple is a multinational technology company that designs, manufactures, and markets consumer electronics, software, and online services. It is known for its innovative products like the iPhone, iPad, and Mac computers.
competitors.advantages: Strong brand loyalty, premium product offerings, and a robust ecosystem of hardware and software.

competitors.name: IBM Corporation
competitors.description: IBM is a global technology and consulting company that offers a wide range of services, including cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and enterprise solutions. It has a long history of innovation in technology.
competitors.advantages: Strong presence in enterprise solutions, extensive research and development capabilities, and a focus on hybrid cloud and AI.
